snippet: Keith Olbermann, who has been missing from recent campaign coverage on Current TV, said he would begin running the channel's election coverage when he returns from a week's vacation.
abstract: Keith Olbermann, who has been missing from recent campaign coverage on Current TV, said he would begin running the channel's election coverage when he returns from a week's vacation.
lead_paragraph: Keith Olbermann will be absent from his nightly "Countdown" on Monday night, and the rest of this week, too.

headline.main: Tensions 'Resolved,' Olbermann Plans Campaign Coverage on Current
